div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CodeableReference|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 ComplexType `CodeableReference` is representable via FHIR R4 extensions. FHIR R5 ComplexType `CodeableReference` is representable via FHIR R4 extensions. Element `CodeableReference` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `CodeableConcept`. Element `CodeableReference` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Reference`.

FHIR R5 ComplexType `CodeableReference` is representable via FHIR R4 extensions. FHIR R5 ComplexType `CodeableReference` is representable via FHIR R4 extensions. Element `CodeableReference` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `CodeableConcept`. Element `CodeableReference` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Reference`.

Element `CodeableReference.concept` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `CodeableConcept`. Element `CodeableReference.concept` is will have a context of Reference based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Reference`.

Element `CodeableReference.concept` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `CodeableConcept`. Element `CodeableReference.concept` is will have a context of Reference based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Reference`.

Element `CodeableReference.reference` is will have a context of CodeableConcept based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `CodeableConcept`. Element `CodeableReference.reference` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Reference`.

Element `CodeableReference.reference` is will have a context of CodeableConcept based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `CodeableConcept`. Element `CodeableReference.reference` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Reference`.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.
